mapper.insert:
insert into store_location ( shop_id, f_code, f_name, s_code, s_name, create_time, update_time) VALUES ( #{shopId}, #{fCode}, #{fName}, #{sCode}, #{sName}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
select LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
mapper.update: update store_location set shop_id = #{shopId},f_code = #{fCode},f_name = #{fName},s_code = #{sCode},s_name = #{sName},create_time = #{createTime},update_time = #{updateTime} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id , shop_id, f_code, f_name, s_code, s_name, create_time, update_time from store_location where id=#{id}
select id , shop_id, f_code, f_name, s_code, s_name, create_time, update_time from store_location where shop_id=#{shopId}
